FuncDef: This command is used on transit routers when a static LSP is defined. The static LSP on the ingress router is initiated using theconfig router mpls static-lsplsp-namecommand. Anin-labelcan be associated with either apopor aswapaction, but not both. If both actions are specified, the last action specified takes effect.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the incoming MPLS label on which to match. Values-32 to 1023.
